metadata.title: CVE-2016-8569 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The git_oid_nfmt function in commit.c in libgit2 before 0.24.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a cat-file command with a crafted object file. It was discovered that libgit2 mishandled certain malformed git objects. A remove attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1').
